Actions.Name: Whirling Blade
Actions.Effect: A different foe in range 3 takes [fray] damage.
Actions.CriticalHit: All foes in range 3 take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Shadow Clone
Actions.Description: Summon a shadow clone in a free space in range 3. Clones disappear at the end of combat or if the Shinobi is defeated.

Summons.Name: Shadow Clone
Summons.Effect: Foes adjacent to a shadow clone at the start of their turn take [fray] damage from the clone.

Actions.Name: Shadow Swap
Actions.Description: The Shinobi swaps places with a shadow clone, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Raiton
Actions.Description: The Shinobi calls down lightning on a foe in range 6. At the end of that foe's turn, they take 3 damage, five times and are blinded. Reduce this damage by one time for every other non-summon character in range 2, which could cause it to do no damage.
